name: Ba-thesis.github.io
tagline: Social Network Analysis of Mexican Drug-Trafficking Organizations (University of Chicago B.A. Thesis)
body:
Contains the procedure and data sets necessary to perform complex network analysis of Mexican cartel activity, as described in my B.A Thesis: "Mapping the Mexican Cartel: Using Biomimicry, Big Data, and Complex Network Analysis to Understand Transnational Criminal Networks"

(Submitted to the Department of Public Policy Studies at the University of Chicago Spring 2014)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
